description: Retrieves statistical data for a specific player for a given season.
Retrieves all available seasons for player statistics.
Retrieves all available player statistics for a specific fixture.
Retrieves player statistics for a specific league and season.
Retrieves player statistics for a specific team and season.
Retrieve all available seasons in which a specified player has participated.
Retrieve the current squad of a specified team.
Retrieve the list of all available players' profiles, including personal details and team affiliations.
Retrieve all teams and seasons in which a player has played during their career.
